name: Y.A.S.S.S
description:
Yet Another Side-Scrolling Space Shooter

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Current state of game: no content

Hello and welcome to my hobby project. This game is in active development since 2020 November 17. Feel free to follow to see how I progress.

Controls

Movement: W,A,S,D

----------------------------------------------

Movement: Keyboard ARROWS

----------------------------------------------

Movement: Gamepad LEFT STICK

Bugs
  • Keyboard input doesn't work until you click on the game
  • After going fullscreen, keyboard input doesn't work until game is clicked
Contribution

Let me know if you can help with any of the bugs. Feel free to comment about anything you like / dislike / want to see in the game
